ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-18 08:13:05. [Issue ID 1044102]
ComicInfo.Summary: The final issue of our first series is here! Peter, Amy, and Charlie must once again face the creatures of darkness as their insidious plan is revealed! The resurrection of Jerry Dandrige and there is going to be Hell to pay! But an unsuspecting ally may help the motley crew of vampire killers to escape the mounting horrors with their lives. The official continuation of Tom Holland's amazing screenplay delivers Fright Night's unique mix of horror, humor, and heart! This issue comes with four covers - Main by Roy Allan Martinez, Throwback by Neil Vokes, Jerry & Evil by Buz Hasson & Ken Haeser, and a limited edition also featuring the stark Black & White art of Roy Allan Martinez!
